content: Especially for FHIR's internal artifacts such as FHIR ValueSets if we don't want to modify anything but adding our translations (including their acceptabilities) while preserve the original contents in English.
A further question is how to translate FHIR resources, i.e., its data models, just for i18n purposes.

@Lin Zhang What you will want to use for the code translations are Code System Supplements, which allow you to add designations for an existing code. The question about translating FHIR resources I think would be best to discuss on the translations and maybe the implementers streams.
@Rob Hausam Thanks, Rob. Very helpful.
